Still remember holding my breath watching game 5, where the Rockets fell behind the Knicks 3-2, on split-screen with OJ’s white Bronco racing down the highway. Surreal. 

Thankfully, we came back & won the next two games (I was at game 7) to win our first championship! 🚀 🚀 https://twitter.com/espn/status/1273254109471260672 QT @espn June 17, 1994 remains one of the most eventful days in sports history:

🏈  O.J. Simpson chase
⛳️  Arnold Palmer's final U.S. Open
⚽️  U.S. hosts first World Cup
🏀  Game 5 of 1994 NBA Finals
🏒  Rangers Stanley Cup parade
⚾️  Ken Griffey Jr.'s 30th HR (tied most before 6/30) http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EauB1kxXsAEX06C.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EauB2FUXQAUkJ9t.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EauB2jZWAAcj07e.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EauB3XNXkAcjA1m.jpg
